title: Notre Vision - Gérard Lledo | LLEDO Industries
description: Discover the vision of Gérard Lledo, founder and president of LLEDO Industries Group. A constant commitment to French industrial excellence.

hero.title: Gérard Lledo
hero.subtitle: Fondateur et Président
hero.intro: Since 1989, my vision is simple: to build a French industrial group of excellence, capable of meeting the most demanding needs of the aerospace and defense industries. Today, LLEDO Industries Group brings together 70 passionate employees around shared values.
hero.quote: Notre force réside dans la complémentarité de nos expertises et l'engagement de chaque collaborateur. Ensemble, nous relevons les défis techniques les plus complexes.

milestones.description: Gérard Lledo crée MPEB, spécialisée dans l'usinage de précision pour l'aéronautique.
Reconnaissance de notre système qualité et de nos process industriels.
Intégration d'un bureau d'études pour renforcer notre offre technique.
Extension vers la maintenance et l'installation pour offrir un service complet.
Obtention de la certification aéronautique la plus exigeante.
Acquisition de compétences en tôlerie et chaudronnerie.
The group continues its development with multiple complementary entities.

industrialVision.title: Our ambition for the future
industrialVision.subtitle: Remaining a partner for all types of industrial players, from the smallest to the most structured, in a relationship built on proximity, trust and continuity
paragraphs: In a context of industrial reshoring and technological sovereignty, LLEDO Industries Group has a role to play. Our ambition is to support contractors in aerospace and defense with a collaborative, accessible approach.

We invest in our equipment: latest-generation 5-axis machining, 3D metrology tools, simulation and optimization software. Our goal: to be at the forefront of technology to meet the most demanding specifications.
Developing our teams is at the heart of our strategy. Continuous training, skills development, knowledge transfer: we prepare the future by cultivating the technical excellence of our people.

We are also developing a design and marketing activity for GSE (Ground Support Equipment) for helicopters under the LLEDO Aerotools brand, leveraging our expertise in precision mechanics and our knowledge of the aerospace sector.
